sub_title: Head of Software Engineering | Mobile Banking App @ ING Bank
summary:
I am an engineering director for the Mobile Banking App of ING Bank in the Netherlands. I am end to end responsible for development of new features, operational stability and continuity of ING Bank NL's service through the banking app for 7+ million ING Bank customers in NL. 

Day to day operation means providing technology (/ finance / HR / IT Risk / strategy) leadership for 100+ developers, engineering managers, integrators and other staff in Netherlands, Belgium, Spain, Romania and Manilla/ Philippines.

•• 
    Software developer by origin & heart. Recognised at ING Bank as ambitious tech leader. Completed several international projects with complex digital flows or application in multi-stakeholder environments at ING Bank NL & BE
    
    Strong emphasis on one learning organisation, transition at large scale towards microteams (and other team topologies), containerised cloud environments with acknowledged, verified results.

    As member of leadership team on business tribe level, I align business and technology roadmaps in a multidisciplinary MT in an enterprise (banking) environment.
    
    Frequent speaker at international tech conferences (Qcon London, Codemotion, GoTo Conf, Jfall NL,
    NextGen Tech) 
•• 

From 2019 till early 2022, I held a (cross border) Tech leader role where I was responsible for IT delivery of all digital flows around private and business (SME) accounts of ING Bank customers in Netherlands and Belgium, on ING's mobile and human channels (branches). Providing technology leadership for +- 24 teams, +- 160 FTE.

I am a fan of sci-fi movies, sci-fi writers like Stanislaw Lem, Phillip K. Dick or Cyberpunk genre and I can endlessly talk about it.

certifications.name: Oracle Certified Professional, Java SE 6 Programmer

profile_positions.description:
I am a senior tech leader for the Mobile Banking App of ING Bank in the Netherlands. Being end-to-end responsible for development of new features, operational stability and continuity of ING Bank NL's service through the banking app for 7+ million ING Bank customers in NL.  

Next to ING NL focus, my department owns and maintains technical (codebase, pipelines, modular features) foundation which is reused in mobile banking apps of multiple other countries with ING Bank presence. 
Day to day operation means providing technology / finance / HR / IT Risk / strategy leadership for 100+ developers, engineering managers, integrators and other staff in Netherlands, Belgium, Spain, Romania and Philippines.
profile_positions.title: Head of IT (Senior IT Manager) Mobile Banking App @ ING Bank NL

profile_positions.description:
I am a Head of IT (Current Accounts & Savings) with cross border, senior level accountability for ING Bank NL & ING Bank BE. Tribe Daily Banking NL is one of the largest commercial development departments at ING Group head office (> 160 IT, >250 FTE total). 

My span of control consists of +- 24 teams, based in Brussels, Amsterdam, Leeuwarden, various delivery centers in India, totalling over 160 fte.

I am responsible for IT delivery of all digital flows around private and business (SME) accounts of ING Bank customers in Netherlands and Belgium, on ING's digital- and human channels (branches), for +- 8 million private and SME (business) ING customers. 
Examples of such (mobile/web) flows : real time onboarding and opening of all ING Bank accounts, closing of accounts and off boarding, as well as complex life-events processes such as account seizures, deceased processes, account holds, blockades, etc. 

This role includes end-to-end accountability for platform stability, security, software delivery but also finance/budgets, IT risk or HR/sourcing strategy.
 
I also hold the position of Product Lead for ING developed open source process orchestration software (Baker platform), cloud engineering / container platform teams.
profile_positions.title: Head of IT (Senior IT Manager) Tribe Daily Banking NL & BE

profile_positions.description:
• I lead a chapter of up to 19 talented programmers where we engage in coding sessions in order to improve our craft as well as spark innovation and make it beneficial for ING Bank. 

• I provide technical guidance to IT teams where my chapter members are situated.

• I am a Toyota Kata mentor in improvement trajectiories.

• Aligninig technical and business matters with stakeholders, also outside IT domain.

• HR- issues of my chapter members, external and internal employee selection and contracting.  

• Speaking at, and organisation of IT tech meetings within ING Bank. 
 
Dreyfus Model skill level - "Expert".

Recent projects : 
• (2018..) Currently IT Chapter Lead at X Border Front End Platform tribe

• Algorithmic classification of text based user feedback on ING customer feedback channels using machine learning (developer, project lead). 
Tools & Methods : Java, TensorFlow, Polymer 2.0, Google NLP API 

• Generic email / password registration API & front end component for international ING IT programme (technical product-owner)

• ING built application suite to schedule & manage financial appointments with the bank from multiple digital channels: web, mobile, closed banking environment. 
Scheduling over 1000 financial appointments per day with an active user base of 1300+ financial advisors in 250+ ING offices. The default platform for online appointment scheduling between ING customers and the bank. (front end developer / team lead)

Tools & Methods: Webcomponents / Polymer 2, AngularJS, Karma, Proractor, HTML5, CSS, Bootstrap, GruntJS, Bower, Intellij, Maven, Jenkins, Nolio, Gitlab, Service Now.
profile_positions.title: IT Chapter Lead - Engineering Manager - Lead Engineer

profile_positions.description:
As interim / external hire from Ordina N.V.

2013 - 2015 : Redesign of ING Bank's web presence, full stack development of entire ing.nl domain. Migrating away from JSP stack to modular, Angular based presentation layer. 

 • Speaker at ING front end related tech meetings
 
2015 - 2016 : Development of a generic library to redistribute as GUI components for other teams to use. These were AngularJS directives & Polymer webcomponents with CSS styles, template html, interaction- and content logic.

Tools & Methods: AngularJS, Polymer 1.x / webcomponents, Java / Spring, Karma, Protractor, HTML5, CSS, Bootstrap, GruntJS, Bower, Intellij, Maven, SDL Tridion, Tomcat, Jenkins, Stash, Jira.
profile_positions.title: Senior Software developer : JavaScript / Java [external hire]

profile_positions.description:
Worked as external consultant for various clients of Ordina N.V, as Android (lead) developer, Java / Front-End (fullstack developer)

Worked for clients listed below : TNO, Philips / TP Vision, VGZ, ING Bank
profile_positions.title: Senior Software Developer (Android / Java / Front-End)

profile_positions.description:
In a  team of 2 developers, 2 designers, product owner, client representative I fulfilled a leading and client facing role to VGZ in translating technical requirements to a refactored Android mobile app. 

Zorg Hulp app included features such as : 
• full graphical redesign from version 1.0
• managing medical appointments with calendar, notes, illness profiles,  
• sound recording and saving of medical consults, 
• locating nearest health supplier, 
• nationwide health supplier search migrated to Open Health Hub 2.0 web service. 

Tools & Methods : Android SDK, Eclipse ADT, GitHub & Git, SourceTree, OpenHealthHub API 1.0 / 2.0.
profile_positions.title: Android Developer

profile_positions.description:
As interim / external hire from Ordina N.V.

Fast paced project where I have built a native Android application, together with one iOS developer, tester, two junior developers and a product owner which resulted in “Ambilight plus Hue” app.

The app connects your Android device to the Philips Ambilight TV set and Hue set of lamps (via wifi / Zigbee device). The phone receives color codes from the TV unit and sends them to the Zigbee unit that continuously updates the lamps' colors. The result is a real time color extension of the Ambilight color effect. 

• The app was released in the Google Play store in July 2013: http://tinyurl.com/o747zvl
• Philips micro site explaining how this app works : http://tinyurl.com/l36q33z
• Philips campaign movie promoting the app on YouTube: http://tinyurl.com/le76amx 
• More information on Zigbee and Zigbee Alliance : http://tinyurl.com/oof3fgf
profile_positions.title: Android developer / Java developer [external hire]

profile_positions.description:
As interim / external hire from Ordina N.V.

Java & Adobe Flex developer for several geoscientific software information systems which were part of Basis Registratie Ondergrond programme. Resulting projects made complex and large sets of data about the Dutch subsurface available to geoscientists or general public.
For example: https://www.dinoloket.nl/ondergrondgegevens 

Tools & Methods : EJB 3.0, Adobe Flex 4, ActionScript 3.0, Java, Mate Flex Framework, POJO's, BlazeDs, JBoss 5, Maven, Jenkins, JUnit, Sonar, Esri ArcGis API, CSS.
profile_positions.title: Java developer / Adobe Flex developer [external hire]

profile_positions.description:
Adobe Flash & Flex, Java development of a browser based MMORPG "Club Galactik".

Development of features such as: parental control, user account management, in-game payment system, in-game credits, chat, client-server communication of the above mentioned features, game moderation tools. Working in Agile Scrum teams.

Due to bankruptcy the project is no longer available online, demos available on YouTube : https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=club+galactik

Tools & Methods : Adobe Flex, Flash, Spring, Agile Scrum, ActionScript 3.0, HTML, CSS, Sonar, JUnit.
profile_positions.title: Adobe Flash & Flex developer / Java developer
